availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Fayette County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary McCall Shivel on August 9, 1853. Father of Phillip Shivel and James Shivel. Married to Sarah Shivel. Farmer in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Served in Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards (U.S.A), as Corporal from May 7, 1862 to July 7, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 870.
